      Methods in com.ibm.team.process.common with parameters of type IRole 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void IProcessArea.addRoleAssignments(IContributorHandle contributor, IRole[] roles)
      Appends the given roles to the collection of roles assigned to the given contributor.
      IRole[] IProcessArea.getRoleAssignments(IContributorHandle contributor, IRole[] availableRoles)
      Returns the subset of the given collection of available roles which are assigned to the given contributor in this process area.
      void IProcessArea.removeRoleAssignments(IContributorHandle contributor, IRole[] rolesToRemove)
      Removes the given roles from the collection of roles assigned to the given contributor.
      void IProcessArea.setRoleAssignments(IContributorHandle contributor, IRole[] roles)
      Sets the collection of roles assigned to the given contributor.
